iebaker.xenon.slice

Class Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • iebaker.xenon.slice.Selection

  • public class Selection
extends java.lang.Object
    Selection provides functionality for performing Node operations on groups of nodes. Nodes can be added to a selection and manipulated with the division and padding methods.

      • select

        public java.util.List<Node> select(java.util.List<Node> tbs)
        Selects nodes, if they are not already in the selection
        Parameters:
        tbs - Nodes to be selected
        Returns:
        Any nodes which were newly added to the selection

      • reselect

        public java.util.List<Node> reselect(java.util.List<Node> tbs)
        Selects nodes, clearing the selection beforehand.
        Parameters:
        tbs - Nodes to be selected
        Returns:
        Redundantly, the newly selected nodes (which must be all of them)

      • unselect

        public void unselect(java.util.List<Node> tbs)
        Removes nodes from the selection.
        Parameters:
        tbs - Nodes to be removed from the selection

      • getSelection

        public java.util.List<Node> getSelection()
        Returns the list of selected nodes
        Returns:
        All nodes currently in the selection, as a java.util.List

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Node node)
        Containment checker
        Parameters:
        node - The node in question
        Returns:
        Whether the selection currently contains that node

      • getChild

        public Node getChild(java.lang.String... args)
              throws ChildNotFoundException
        Retrieval method for a child of the nodes in the selection. Returns the first child it finds with the specfied path, or throws a ChildNotFoundException if no child can be found
        Parameters:
        args - The path to the child node
        Returns:
        the child node found first with that path
        Throws:
        ChildNotFoundException

      • getChildren

        public java.util.List<Node> getChildren(java.lang.String... args)
                                 throws ChildNotFoundException
        Retrieval method for a group of children of the ndoes in the selection. Returns any child that matches the path from any of the nodes in the selection, or throws a ChildNotFoundException if no child can be found
        Parameters:
        args - The path to the children nodes
        Returns:
        Any nodes which match this path from a node in the selection
        Throws:
        ChildNotFoundException

      • divide

        public java.util.List<Node> divide(Slice slice)

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets the padding on all the nodes in the selection (to different values)
        Parameters:
        left - The left padding
        top - The top padding
        right - the right padding
        bottom - the bottom padding

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(float p)
        Sets the padding on all the nodes in the selection (to the same value)
        Parameters:
        p - The value to set all padding to
